thread_count_fine_tuning.description: Fine-tune thread count around the optimal 2000 range to find exact peak. Note: batch_size is automatically set to count (100) for scenario 2.

connection_pool_impact.description: Test with different connection pool sizes to support higher concurrency
connection_pool_impact.note: Requires MAX_POOL_SIZE environment variable override per test. Note: batch_size is automatically set to count (100) for scenario 2.

optimal_combination_validation.description: Validate optimal combination from above tests with extended duration. Note: batch_size is automatically set to count (100) for scenario 2.

high_thread_exploration.description: Explore higher thread counts with optimized pool sizes to find absolute maximum. Note: batch_size is automatically set to count (100) for scenario 2.

payload_size_impact.description: Test impact of different payload sizes (1K, 10K, 100K, 500K, 1MB) on throughput with optimal thread/batch configuration. Note: batch_size is automatically set to count (100) for scenario 2.

scenario1_individual_inserts.description: Test Scenario 1 (individual inserts) with all payload sizes and different thread counts to discover maximum throughput for individual inserts. Note: Scenario 1 does not use batch_size.
